AbsoluteZero.title: Absolute Zero
AbsoluteZero.powers: {AbsoluteZero} deals himself 1 Cold Damage. You may play an Equipment card. If you do not, destroy one of your Equipment cards. Draw 2 Cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Sorry, I don't have a cold pun in storage right now.

AkashThriya.title: Akash'Thriya
AkashThriya.powers: Select a Primordial Seed from your trash and put it on the bottom of your deck. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Primordial Seed, play it, and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Sorry, I don't have a cold pun in storage right now.

TheArgentAdept.title: The Argent Adept
TheArgentAdept.powers: Play a card. Activate that card's [u]perform[/u] text. Activate that card's [u]accompany[/u] text.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I wonder if I can carry a tune all the way through this...

Benchmark.title: Benchmark
Benchmark.powers: You may play a Software card. Until the end of your next turn, that Software is indestructible. {Benchmark} deals 1 Target Lightning Damage equal to the number of Software cards in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Bunker.title: Bunker
Bunker.powers: Draw 2 cards. Discard a card for each of your other cards with powers in play. This turn, you may use as many powers as you have cards with powers in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Bunker.title: Bunker
Bunker.powers: Search your deck or trash for a Mode and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. Play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

CaptainCosmic.title: Captain Cosmic
CaptainCosmic.powers: Draw a card. Select a Construct Target. Until the start of your next turn, that Construct is Indestructible. That Construct deals itself 2 Energy Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

ChronoRanger.title: Chrono-Ranger
ChronoRanger.powers: Draw a card. Until the end of your next turn, damage dealt to and by {ChronoRanger} is irreducible.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Expatriette.title: Expatriette
Expatriette.powers: Until the end of the turn, reduce damage dealt by {Expatriette} by 1. Play the top card of your deck. You may use an additional power this turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I've brought the whole arsenal this time.

Fanatic.title: Fanatic
Fanatic.powers: Fanatic deals up to 2 Targets and themselves 1 Radiant Damage. Play a card or use a power.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Guise.title: Guise
Guise.powers: Draw a card. Wait, that's it? Fine, select 1 of your Ongoing cards. Until the end of your next turn, that Ongoing is Indestructible.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Wait, I'm here? That means I've got a fan! Woo!

Haka.title: Haka
Haka.powers: Play a card. Draw until you have 2 cards in your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

TheHarpy.title: The Harpy
TheHarpy.powers: Draw a card. Flip all but 1 of your {arcana} or {avian} tokens. {TheHarpy} deals herself Psychic Damage equal to the number of tokens flipped this way.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Knyfe.title: K.N.Y.F.E.
Knyfe.powers: Draw a card. Until the end of your next turn, when {Knyfe} deals themselves damage, they Regain 1 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: A chance to take a few more risks, eh?

LaComodora.title: La Comodora
LaComodora.powers: Flip a face-down Card in your play area, treating it as if it were just put into play. Until the end of your next turn, when one of your Equipment cards would be destroyed, flip it face-down instead.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Legacy.title: Legacy
Legacy.powers: You may play a One-Shot. If you do not, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
devNotes: Potentially swap wording to 'If you did not play a one-shot' for handling the case where your hand is empty.

Lifeline.title: Lifeline
Lifeline.powers: {Lifeline} deals up to 2 Targets 1 Infernal Damage. {Lifeline} Regains HP equal to the number of targets damaged this way.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Luminary.title: Luminary
Luminary.powers: Discard the top card of your deck. Select a Device Target. That Device deals itself 5 Lightning Damage. If that Device is destroyed, draw 2 cards and you may play a Device.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

MrFixer.title: Mr. Fixer
MrFixer.powers: {MrFixer} deals 1 Target 1 Melee Damage and himself 0 Melee Damage. You may play a Tool card. If you do not, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Tool card, play it, and shuffle the other cards revealed this way into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: This seems like the right time to strike.

TheNaturalist.title: The Naturalist
TheNaturalist.powers: Power: Play a card. Then, for each of {gazelle}, {rhinoceros} or {crocodile} that card has in its text, until the end of your next turn you may activate that icon's effects. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

NightMist.title: NightMist
NightMist.powers: Until the end of your next turn, when {NightMist} would deal a hero target damage, reduce that damage by 1. Draw a card or play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Let's see if I can practice what I teach.

OmnitronX.title: Omnitron-X
OmnitronX.powers: Until the start of your next turn, your Components are indestructible. {OmnitronX} deals 1 Target and themselves Lightning Damage equal to the number of your Components in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

Parse.title: Parse
Parse.powers: Look at the top card of the Environment Deck. {Parse} may deal 1 Target damage equal to the number of cards in that Deck's Trash. If damage is dealt this way, shuffle the Environment Trash into the Environment Deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
devNotes: This is coded as 'up to 1', but shouldn't make a difference since Guise can't interact and making it actually optional is messy. I'll fix it if there's every something that interacts with it, but since Chrono-Ranger uses similar logic for his optional damage, this is the default for playability. And Guise can't break this yet, as far as I know.
This might still be a bit strong in certain combos. Allowing this to mess with Villain decks was a bit much, though, due to those that use the discard as a resource.

Tachyon.title: Tachyon
Tachyon.powers: Play the top card of your Trash. Move the top card of your Trash to the bottom of your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

VoidGuardMainstay.title: Mainstay
powers: Draw a card. Until the start of your next turn, whenever exactly 1 Damage would be dealt to {VoidGuardMainstayCharacter}, prevent that damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
